property.name: consent_text_1
property.default: WHICH LANGUAGE WOULD YOU LIKE TO TAKE THE TEST IN? TAKE YOUR PICK!
property.label: consent_text_1

property.name: consent_text_2
property.default: The test is currently available in English and Spanish.
property.label: consent_text_2

property.name: consent_text_3
property.default: Note: Some bilingual people have reported that taking the test in their maternal language was easier than taking it in their second language.
property.label: consent_text_3
